data.sentence: The word فَلَا comes from the root ل ا and is associated with the meanings:

data.meanings: to say/speak, to call, to be named, word/speech, utterance, a thing said, greeting, discourse, one who says/speaks. To inspire/transmit/relate/answer/think/profess, emit an opinion on, indicate a state or condition or circumstance. qa'ilun - speaker, indicator.
data.sentence: The word قَالَ comes from the root ق و ل and is associated with the meanings: to say/speak, to call, to be named, word/speech, utterance, a thing said, greeting, discourse, one who says/speaks. To inspire/transmit/relate/answer/think/profess, emit an opinion on, indicate a state or condition or circumstance. qa'ilun - speaker, indicator.
The word هَؤُلَاءِ comes from the root ا و ل ا and is associated with the meanings:

data.meanings: Inclined, approached, drew near to setting (said of the sun). Menstruation (said of a woman). Become a guest, refuge of someone. Become correlative to something. Correlation, or reciprocal correlation, so that one cannot be conceived in the mind without the other. Beign collected, joined, added together.Ran, hastened, fled, sped, turned away.Beset by distress of mind. Hardship, difficulty, or distress.Asking, or calling, for an aid.
data.sentence: The word ضَيْفِي comes from the root ض ي ف and is associated with the meanings: Inclined, approached, drew near to setting (said of the sun). Menstruation (said of a woman). Become a guest, refuge of someone. Become correlative to something. Correlation, or reciprocal correlation, so that one cannot be conceived in the mind without the other. Beign collected, joined, added together.Ran, hastened, fled, sped, turned away.Beset by distress of mind. Hardship, difficulty, or distress.Asking, or calling, for an aid.

data.meanings: expose vices/faults or evil qualities/actions, to disgrace, put to shame, the daybreak/dawn because it exposes everything, white but not intensely so.
data.sentence: The word تَفْضَحُونِ comes from the root ف ض ح and is associated with the meanings: expose vices/faults or evil qualities/actions, to disgrace, put to shame, the daybreak/dawn because it exposes everything, white but not intensely so.
